column5: Card Description
Knives jump around and slash the opponent if she touches them. They fly high and the move grazes\, so it\'s perfect for mid-air attacks.
Releases knives that bounce against the walls and ceiling. Not particularly powerful\, but good for walling off opponents.
A knife under the influence of time acceleration. Since it flies straight forward at high speed\, it\'s good at dealing with head-on attacks.

Stops time and teleports. Since it\'s usually hard to tell when she\'s teleporting\, it\'s useful as a warp technique. She leaves a card behind\, which is probably to make it look like her own kind of magic.
Irregularly throws knives in orbit around her. Can naturally be used as a shield. If the enemy hits the upper edge of the orbit\, it\'s also a high-powered attack.
A bouncing knife effect that focuses on quality over quantity. They have no attack power at first\, but they do more damage and move faster the more times they bounce off the walls.
Throws knives and then manipulates time to stop them in midair. The knives will resume motion after time passes\, or after placing another set.
After being hit by the enemy\, circle back around them and surround them with knives. Since she\'s concentrating in wait for a physical attack\, projectiles will just hit her directly.
Knifes float around and attack in sync\, turning into bullets. The type\, speed and angle of attacks can change\, so this move is a great support during attacks.
Throws knives\, which then multiply and fly towards the opponent. The knives will try to hit the opponent on the sides\, and will catch the opponent off guard as she is attempting to run.

Throws phantom knives that manifest themselves physically in succession as they move towards the opponent. They disappear if Sakuya performs another attack\, but have quite a large range of suppression.

Another Sakuya will appear right in front of the actual Sakuya. If you can input the buttons before she splits bodies\, the two bodies will move indepdently. The reason behind this? Parallel universes\, etc\, etc.
Knives scatter outwards\, then rush in the direction of the enemy.
Her specialty\, time manipulation. It delays time around her\, slowing down the enemy\, providing overwhelming offensive and defensive superiority.
Hacks the enemy to pieces with knives using both hands. It starts at close range\, like a melee attack\, but beware its expanding scope.
A stronger version of killing doll. Knives scatter outwards and bombard the enemy. A very powerful attack.
One of the strongest time manipulation spells. An unfair spell that completely stops time around her so she can attack\, but it\'s expensive and slow to recover.
A stronger version of her cutting spell. Power and scope are greatly magnified.
Simultaneously launches bouncing knives in all directions. Individually their power is weak\, but it makes up for it in quantity and range.
Sends rapid-fire knives forwards. It\'s said that she\'s just desperately throwing them\, but nobody knows for sure.
Throws knives at high speed and they attack the enemy after a short time lag. Very hard to spot\, and the knives go everywhere\, but the last knife is the one that hits.
A technique that throws out time suspension fields. Enemies caught in the field can\'t move until they leave it.
Stops time and throws knife. Knife trails caused by time lag also materialize\, and surround the enemy.
Knife that reflects back and forth across the screen repeatedly. It reflects at full power\, so it can pin down enemies for a long time.
Throws a watch that stops time at the opponent. If it hits\, she will be unable to defend Sakuya\'s attacks for a while.
